languages.text: The character gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} equal to 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, равный 20% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The character gains a bonus to their Strength equal to 20% of their maximum wounds.
